programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: A stunning snake goddess in human form seduces a young scholar before a Buddhist monk breaks up their union.

programme.title: Moods of Love
programme.desc: How far would you go for love? Or lust? These are the questions posed in two, sinfully entertaining Sung Dynasty tales that comprise this film.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Legendary director Chang Cheh teams Alexander Fu Sheng and 'Venoms' Lo Meng and Kuo Chue in an exciting tale of a kung fu blacksmith.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Share the exploits of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. In addition to the mix is a Shaolin monk and his dangerous mute sister!

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: Three swordsmen's search for the murderous Bat Without Wings brings to light a plethora of criminal individuals and twists in the tale.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Kung fu idols Wang Yu, Lo Meng and Loh Lieh star in this comedy set in a Shaolin temple where Hung Hsi-kuan and Fang Shih-yu become disciples.

programme.title: The Secret of the Dirk
programme.desc: Lovely Ching Li and handsome Chang I unite as star-and-sword-crossed comrades who take on the vicious Black Tigers gang in a quest for hidden wealth.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: This Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical depicts a turbulent romance between Yu Lan, a passionate tea picker and a charming fisherman named Chun Yang.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: This splendid, award-winning film features Li Li Hua as the Empress Wu Tse-tien, the most powerful woman in China's four thousand year history.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A ruthless gang goes up against a millionaire's daughter who has one of three priceless Golden Buddha statues.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: This wartime drama centres on a lonely Shanghai widow (Cora Miao) and the Hong Kong playboy (Chow Yun-Fat) who decides to court her.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po and Chang Yi play a noble swordsman and a one-armed swordswoman who find themselves up against the evil Crimson Charm gang of thieves and thugs.

programme.title: Killer Constable
programme.desc: In director Kuei Chih Hung and kung-fu champion Chen Kuan Tai's best martial arts movie, Chen illuminates the screen as an obsessive chief constable.

programme.title: The Yuppie Fantasia 3
programme.desc: Challenges in Leung Foon's life turn him into a chauvinist who hates himself. However, the arrival of his daughter spells a second chance at redemption.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: Years after Chen Xun is done with school, he follows his heart & his memories on a quest to reconnect with the girl he once loved as a schoolboy

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Andy Lau and Eric Tsang star in this thriller about a mole in the police department and an undercover cop, both of whom go all out to expose each other.

programme.title: School Tales
programme.desc: Members of a marching band bond over an annual band camp and decide to tempt fate by 'testing' the ghostly legends that surround their school.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: Starring Jackie Chan, Show Lo & Nana Ou-yang, this film portrays a hardened special forces agent who fights to protect a young woman from a sinister criminal gang.

programme.title: Cook Up a Storm
programme.desc: Nicholas Tse & Jung Yong Hwa helm this blockbuster filmed in Guangzhou, Macau & Europe, about a Cantonese cook who takes on a Michelin-starred rival for a prestigious title.

programme.title: Run for Love
programme.desc: Starring Zhang Zi Yi, Eddie Peng, Zhou Dong Yu & Michelle Chen, this romantic anthology features five love stories set in Japan, Turkey, the US, Norway & Saipan, with five different directors.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three-armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor & his assistant must put up the fight of their lives to stop them from obtaining a bullet that is a key piece of evidence.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A special needs teacher who has a brother with a disability goes on an unexpected journey of self-discovery when he and his friends take part in a musical they deem to be a waste of time.

programme.title: The Wedding Diary
programme.desc: A fisherman's son plans to marry the daughter of a rich developer. He promises a grand wedding but the cost is too high. He goes gambling and loses everything! Will the wedding go on?

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a happy plus-sized girl working as a mascot at a theme park. However, when a weight loss competition turns her into a vain internet icon, she begins to lose the people she loves.

programme.title: Paradox

programme.desc: Dalam usaha menyembuhkan Trhyno, AO (Awesome Ones) menemui satu jalan penyelesaian melalui Golden Bakugan.

programme.title: Al-Kuliyyah
programme.desc: Kemajuan teknologi dan media sosial sebenarnya adalah untuk membantu umat berkomunikasi dan berhubungan. Penggunaannya mesti dimulakan dengan hati yang bersih.

programme.title: Shah Alam 40000
programme.desc: 3 wanita bersahabat baik hidup di kejiranan golongan atasan selalu melepak bersama tapi menyimpan rahsia tersendiri, sehinggalah masing-masing mendedahkan rahsia dan berlakunya insiden yang tidak diingini.

programme.title: Buletin Utama
programme.desc: Berita tempatan dan antarabangsa yang terkini.

programme.title: Anak Sena
programme.desc: Kisah pengorbanan seorang guru dalam membimbing anak masyarakat Orang Asli. Wadi seorang pelajar anak Orang Asli yang mempunyai bakat dalam sukan. Cikgu Amir cuba mencungkil bakat dimiliki pelajar itu.

programme.title: Kau Takdirku
programme.desc: Ketika kanak-kanak, Kamar terjumpa bayi di tepi sungai, dibawanya pulang dan diberi nama Alya. Sehingga mereka dewasa, hubungan Kamar dan Alya sangat rapat.

programme.title: Suami Sebelah Rumah
programme.desc: Eryna and Amar hidup berjiran sejak kecil and pelajar tahun akhir di Universiti. Di kampung, Mak Non, ibu Eryna selalu bertanya khabar kerana dia menyukai Amar yang baik budi pekerti and menghormati orang tua.

programme.title: Pink Smile
programme.desc: Irsyad and isterinya Amina mempunyai dua orang anak perempuan bernama Myra and Luna. Luna, gadis ceria yang masih belajar sangat menyukai Areeq, seorang pengusaha kafe, iaitu Duncan CoffeeHouse.

programme.title: 7 Hari Mencintaiku
programme.desc: Sejak dari sekolah menengah lagi Mia menunjukkan sikap sombongnya pada kawan-kawannya iaitu Khuzairi disebabkan dia anak kepada Pegawai Daerah, ayahnya ditukarkan di kampung tersebut.

programme.title: Senario
programme.desc: Saksikan pelbagai keletah yang menarik dan lucu dari kumpulan pelawak Senario.

programme.title: KOOL FM @ TV9
programme.desc: Kool FM plays music only with no live or pre recorded announcer. Songs selected are of pop, ballad and rock genres from the 70's till now.

programme.title: Dhia Sofea
programme.desc: Dhia pulang ke kampung halamannya setelah tamat kolej. Ibunya Mak Yam, mendedahkan rahsia yang dipendamnya selama 23 tahun. Dhia tersentak apabila diberitahu dia hanyalah anak angkat.

programme.title: Jejak Rasul
programme.desc: Program dokumentari berbentuk ilmiah yang menjejaki peninggalan para rasul dengan paparan peristiwa yang berlaku dalam kehidupan 25 Rasul.

programme.title: Kapsul Surah
programme.desc: Membincangkan dan mengupas setiap surah-surah secara perinci dan memberikan latar belakang surah berserta penerangannya.

programme.title: Tanyalah Ustaz
